text: Remco Ekkers (1 July 1941 – 4 June 2021) was a Dutch poet, critic and writer.Remco Ekkers (1941 - 2021), dichter, docent en onvermoeibaar poëziepromotor, onverwachts overleden Ekkers was a poetry critic for De Gids from 1986 to 1992. He also worked for Leeuwarder Courant for ten years. He was born in Bergen, Netherlands. Ekkers died in Zuidhorn, Netherlands on 4 June 2021, less than a month before his 80th birthday. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Literary critics Category:Dutch poets Category:Writers from North Holland
